product.longDescription:
Fluid, fluted contours, cohesive design, modern innovation. Carry on the perfect blend of fashion and technology with Voltage. Charge your devices with a USB port integrated into the TSA-approved lock panel. Protect your bag and your belongings with the lightweight yet extremely durable exterior. And inside, stay organized with built-in WetPak™ and mesh pockets. All in a sized-to-fit carry-on assured to meet most airline size restrictions.
Exterior Features:
• Lightweight 100% polypropylene exterior offers extreme durability and dynamic shaping
• USB port with protective cover integrates into the TSA-approved lock panel for streamlined design and charging convenience (battery not included)
• Quiet-rolling dual spinner wheels offers effortless maneuverability
• Self-retracting side carry handles stays flush to the case to protect against damage
• Expandable by 1.0" to accommodate additional items when needed
• Ergonomic pull handle features a slide-out privacy ID compartment at its base
Interior Features:
• Easy-to access battery pocket
• Spacious, integrated WetPak™ pocket keeps liquids and toiletries contained
• Large mesh pocket offers organized storage
• Spacious packing compartments feature elastic cross straps custom designed with a pop of color to match exterior and zipped divider panel
•Carry-On size and weight allowances vary by airlines. Visit our for more details. If the bag is overstuffed, it may not be accepted by the airlines.
product.shortDescription: Fluid, fluted contours, cohesive design, modern innovation. Carry on the perfect blend of fashion and technology with Voltage. Charge your devices with a USB port integrated into the TSA-approved lock panel. Protect your bag and your belongings with the lightweight yet extremely durable exterior. And inside, stay organized with built-in WetPak™ and mesh pockets. All in a sized-to-fit carry-on assured to meet most airline size restrictions.

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
Suitcase shell material is made of injection molded polyproplyene, a highly impact-resistant plastic that is strong, lightweight, flexible, and moisture resistant.
Built in USB port lets you power devices on the go. Battery sold separately
To learn more about TSA locks and how to set the lock please visit our lock instructions page
Does the case expand for added packing capacity?
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Voltage DLX Carry-On Spinner | Luggage | Samsonite
product.pageDescription: Find the perfect travel companion with Voltage DLX Carry-On Spinner, where modern elegance meets long-lasting durability in this premium hardside carry-on.
product.headlineDescription:
Carry on the perfect blend of fashion and technology with Voltage. Charge your devices with a USB port integrated into the TSA-approved lock panel. Protect your bag and your belongings with the lightweight yet extremely durable exterior. And inside, stay organized with built-in WetPak™ and mesh pockets.

  • Overall Dimensions: 22 in. x 14 in. x 9 in.
  • Weight: 6.1 lbs
